sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Ethical approval has been obtained from the University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC No. 1647671) and the North Sydney Local Health Districts Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC/16/HAWKE/430). All participants will provide written informed consent.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that Regen Lab SA supplied regenRCT at no cost. We declare that Regen Lab SA have no influence on the collection, analysis or interpretation of study findings. KLP and FC are members of the Editorial Board of BMC Musculoskeletal Disorders, and KLP has financial interests in a regenerative medicine clinic and company.

sec.title: Publisher's Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
